TopicTitle: Trajectories in 1.6.1 ro and rss not working

Articles.Content: I do not know why but, the trajectories red cross hairs does not show up in game but everything else does. Also, I saw the same issue in a 1.7.0 install with a different copy of the most recent trajectories mod from ckan. Also, please tell me if I am wrong about it being compatible with ro and rss though I did see a youtuber use it in ro/rss, I think he was called nessus.  It was the falcon heavy moon landing video with rocket man music in the background. Though he was using 1.2.2 so I think things have changed since then. Also I am new to this forum thing so if I have posted this in the wrong place, sorry.
